de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.validation

Class CompositeValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.validation.CompositeValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    public class CompositeValidator
extends Object
implements Validator
    This Validator implementation is used to compose multiple other validators.

    The ValidationStatus of this validator will contain all messages of all registered validators.

    Author:
    manuel.mauky

      • getValidationStatus

        public ValidationStatus getValidationStatus()
        Description copied from interface: Validator
        Returns the validation status of this validator. The status will be updated when the validator re-validates the inputs of the user.
        Specified by:
